授業目的:
Develop students' critical observation and analysis on socio-economic and cultural issues in a globalizing world, for better global-local development
-- aim to fostering the sense of global citizenship, as well as making contribution to multiculturalism and global peace
到達目標:
Students have the analytical skills to compare different cultures and societies in a globalizing world, using both quantitative and qualitative research methodologies; and having the ability to make comparative cultural-sensitive initiatives for socio-economic activities and public policy.
Students can analyze on cross-cultural issues and activities, ranging from cultural events and symbols.
授業方法:
Lecture by Teacher, Presentation by Students, Small Group Discussions & Debate in ENGLISH Details at LUNA - On Demand e-Learning: t.ly/CBxP
2 Reading Weeks - up to 4 classes (for Book & Project Review, with no Lecture)
2 Fieldwork Exercise (to be done by Students) and Reading Weeks when no classes conducted. When the Course is E-Learning "ON DEMAND" Please check with the LUNA
